segments.text: My attention is drawn to the two children on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're engaged in a very sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly unstable; it's practically tipping over!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate, trying to catch the cookies he's grabbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl stands by, her hand outstretched, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet loot, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope that stool doesn't give way beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height could be quite painful for a child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman still hasn't turned around to see their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, but with significant risks involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret smiles are almost visible.
segments.speaker: PAR
